Reference

All functions

calcMOP

Compute mop serial version

exdet_multvar()

Exdet multivariate: NT2 metric, multivariate extrapolation risk analysis for model transfer

exdet_univar()

Exdet univariate: NT1 metric, univariate extrapolation risk analysis for model transfer

extrapolation_zones()

extrapolation_zones: A simple function to map extrapolation zones

mess()

mess: Multivariate Environmental Similarity Surface (MESS)

mop()

MOP: Extrapolation risk analysis for model transfer

mop_distance()

mop_distance: Estimate mop distance between two matrices

std_vars()

std_vars: Standardize predictors
